channel.title: id-blockchain
channel.description: A working platform to communicate about idblockchain project

item.title: Rebooting the Web of Trust
item.description:
Participation in Rebooting web of trust. A conference held in Paris on April 19-20-21.
https://github.com/WebOfTrustInfo/rebooting-the-web-of-trust-spring2017
Our Papers :
Self-sovereign Delegated Identity by Pierre Noizat

Credit-based Reputations for Identity Management with Blockchain and Flow Networks by Tobias Mayer, Omar Hasan, and Lionel Brunie

ID-Blockchain: An Initiative towards Privacy-preserving Blockchain-based Identity by Olivier Maas & Florent Poiron
RWoT Proposals and Modern Portable Secure Hardware by Nicolas Bacca
